comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/191153#issuecomment-2428397070
> The context menu to copy the text does not work

It has been fixed, but due to MV3 extension limitations, required rule will be available in one of the next extension updates.
You can add this rule:
```adblock
zonatmo.com,visortmo.com,lectortmo.com#$#.element { -webkit-touch-callout: default!important; -moz-user-select: text!important; -webkit-user-select: text!important; -ms-user-select: text!important; -o-user-select: text!important; user-select: text!important; -khtml-user-select: text!important; }
```
to user rules.

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

```adblock
@@||teams.microsoft.com/v*/?meetingjoin=$stealth=webrtc
```

comment.body:
If content and request URL are matched then it rather should replace it (though even if it replaces the content, in devtools in the network panel original content will be shown), but it's hard to tell because I cannot reproduce these ads and I don't see `"isAdShow": true` on my end.
I'm not sure if it will helps, but you can also try this rule:
```adblock
iqiyi.com#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'adSlots data.adverts data.extData.adverts')
```

comment.body:
> If content and request URL are matched then it rather should replace it (though even if it replaces the content, in devtools in the network panel original content will be shown), but it's hard to tell because I cannot reproduce these ads and I don't see `"isAdShow": true` on my end. > 
> ```

在提交issue之前我尝试过类似的“json-prune”脚本规则，刚才我重新测试了这条规则，但是遗憾的是他们都对阻止广告没有帮助。

我从日志上看到这些脚本的确执行了，但是我不确定他们是否真的生效了，或许这个网站对反广告脚本有反制措施？

comment.body:
I was able to reproduce these ads with VPN.
It looks like that `https://www.iqiyi.com/prelw/portal/lw/v5/channel/recommend?lwaFastKey=Page_recommend_1&v=12.94.20247` is a script, not a `XHR` request, so `trusted-replace-xhr-response` cannot be used in this case.
These rules:
```adblock
iqiyi.com##.search-item-box:has(> a > div > div[class^="ad_adContent"])
iqiyi.com##div[class^="list_list__"] > div[style*="margin-bottom:"] > div[style*="margin-right:"]:has(> div > div[style*="background-image:"] div > div[class^="video-list-item_"] > div[class^="video-list-item_"] > a > div[class^="video-list-item_"] > div[class*="video-list-item_"] > img[src*="/ADS/"])
iqiyi.com#%#(()=>{let e=!1;window.qyMesh=window.qyMesh||{},window.qyMesh=new Proxy(window.qyMesh,{get:function(a,t,d){return!e&&a?.preload?.Page_recommend_1?.response?.items&&(a.preload.Page_recommend_1.response.items.forEach(((e,a,t)=>{e.extData?.dataExtAd&&(e.extData.dataExtAd={}),e.video&&e.video.forEach(((e,a,t)=>{e.adverts&&(e.adverts=[]),e.data&&e.data.forEach(((e,a,t)=>{e.ad&&t.splice(a,1)}))}))})),e=!0),Reflect.get(a,t,d)}})})();
||mesh.if.iqiyi.com/portal/*/recommend?$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=ad
||mesh.if.iqiyi.com/portal/*/recommend?$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=adExt
||mesh.if.iqiyi.com/portal/lw/search/$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=ad
||mesh.if.iqiyi.com/portal/lw/search/$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=adExt
||mesh.if.iqiyi.com/tvg/*/lw/base_info?$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=ad_param
```
should fix ads.

comment.body:
SOLVED!
If I disable
`AakList (Anti-Adblock Killer) (url: https://raw.github.com/reek/anti-adblock-killer/master/anti-adblock-killer-filters.txt)`
It works.

I appreciate the help. Thanks so much.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
